Referenced by calculer().

{
  const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_VEF.valeur();
// const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces = zone_VEF.volumes_entrelaces();
  const DoubleVect& porosite_surf = zone_VEF.porosite_face();
  const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs();

  int nb_faces = num_faces.size();
  int numfa;
  double Ud; //!< vitesse debitante
  double area;
  double coefK; //!< pressure loss

  for (int i=0; i<nb_faces; i++)
    {
      numfa = num_faces[i];

      for (int j=0; j<dimension; j++)
        {
          Ud = vit(numfa,j)*porosite_surf[numfa];
// area=zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa);
          area=direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa) : dabs(zone_VEF.face_normales(numfa,direction_perte_charge())); //!< Taking account of inclined plane
          coefK=K();
// if (j!=direction_perte_charge()) coefK=0.;
          resu(numfa,j) -= 0.5*coefK*Ud*dabs(Ud)*area*porosite_surf[numfa];
        }
    }
  return resu;
}

Matrice_Morse &  mat

contribution a la matrice implicite des termes sources
par defaut pas de contribution

< vitesse debitante

< pressure loss

< Taking account of inclined plane

Reimplemented from Source_base.

Reimplemented in Perte_Charge_Singuliere_QC_VEF_P1NC.

Definition at line 126 of file Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face.cpp.

References Matrice_Morse::coef(), dabs(), Objet_U::dimension, Perte_Charge::direction_perte_charge(), Zone_VEF::face_normales(), Zone_VF::face_surfaces(), Perte_Charge_Singuliere::K(), Perte_Charge_VEF_Face::la_vitesse, Perte_Charge_VEF_Face::la_zone_VEF, Perte_Charge_VEF_Face::num_faces, Zone_VF::porosite_face(), IntVect::size(), and Ref_Zone_VEF::valeur().

{
  const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_VEF.valeur();
  const DoubleVect& porosite_surf = zone_VEF.porosite_face();
  const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs();

  int nb_faces = num_faces.size();
  int numfa;
  double Ud; //!< vitesse debitante
  double area;
  double coefK; //!< pressure loss

  for (int i=0; i<nb_faces; i++)
    {
      numfa = num_faces[i];

      for (int j=0; j<dimension; j++)
        {
// Ud    = vit(numfa,j)*porosite_surf[numfa];
          Ud = porosite_surf[numfa];
          double Ud2= vit(numfa,j)*porosite_surf[numfa];
          int n0=numfa*dimension+j;
// area=zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa);
          area=direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa) : dabs(zone_VEF.face_normales(numfa,direction_perte_charge())); //!< Taking account of inclined plane
          coefK=K();
// if (j!=direction_perte_charge()) coefK=0.;
          matrice.coef(n0,n0)+= 0.5*coefK*Ud*dabs(Ud2)*area*porosite_surf[numfa];
        }
    }
}

< not to count several (number of processes) times the same face

  if(je_suis_maitre())
    {
      Cerr << "Faces number found in Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face : " << nfac_tot << finl;

      if (nfac_tot==0)
        {
          Cerr << "Error when defining the surface plane for the singular porosity :" << finl;
          Cerr << "No mesh faces has been found for the surface plane." << finl;
          Cerr << "Check the coordinate of the surface plane which should match mesh coordinates." << finl;
          exit();
        }
